00064 class AlarmHandler : public EventHandler {

00067     string d_version;

00070     AlarmHandler() {}
00071 
00072 public:
00075     AlarmHandler(FILE *s) : d_stream(s) {}
00076

00078     fclose(d_stream);
00079     }
00080 
00093     virtual void handle_signal(int signum) {
00094     if (signum != SIGALRM)
00095         fprintf(stderr, "SIGALRM handler caught another signal!\n");
00096 #if 0
00097     // Use this code, or a variant, once we have reliable error delivery.
00098     fprintf(d_stream, "\n\n\n\n");
00099     Error e("The server has timed out. This happens when a request\n\
00100 takes longer to process than the server's preset time-out value.\n\
00101 Try making a request for a smaller amount of data. You can also contact\n\
00102 the server's administrator and request that the time-out value be increased.");
00103     e.print(d_stream);

00105     exit(1);
00106     }
